page.syntax: Output_String as C = term(N Principal ,N Payment ,N Interest )

argument.name: Principal
argument.description: The amount of a loan. Numeric

argument.name: Payment
argument.description: The amount of a payment per time unit. Numeric

argument.name: Interest
argument.description: The interest rate (e.g. .06) per time unit. Numeric

page.description: Computes the term of a loan.
page.discussion: TERM() returns the number of time units required to repay a loan.
